alert.note: Alert for Benton; Hickory (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:27PM CDT until July 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hickory County in central Missouri... Southern Benton County in central Missouri... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 727 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warsaw, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Truman Lake, Warsaw, Hermitage, Wheatland, Cross Timbers, Edwards, Fristoe and Whitakerville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
